item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This is a test post Hello. This is a post that I might mark as a draft in the near future. It’s a testing post that demonstrates various features of this blog and the styles defined for it. I care way too much about this stuff, but I’m getting it out of the way so I don’t get distracted by it later (I will get distracted by layout and formatting stuff later).

item.title: Who is this person
item.description: My handle is Window Dump (check your man pages to learn more about me). I like computers. I figured out how to program them and get them to do increasingly silly stuff - this blog and its content is just the latest example. If you’re looking for my hilariously outdated fork of KeyZen, a tool used to practice keyboard layouts (i.e., Dvorak, Colemak, Hands Down), you can find it right here, in the usual location.
